step4.title: Make informed decisions
step4.description: Use the insights to refine your idea, create an action plan, and start your business with more confidence.

documentation.title: Getting Started
documentation.description: To get started with the Startupideia API, you'll need to register for an API key through your account dashboard. Once you have your API key, you can make authenticated requests to our endpoints.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: All API requests must include your API key for authentication. We use OAuth 2.0 for secure access to our API resources.

endpoints.title: Available Endpoints
endpoints.description: Our API provides several endpoints to interact with our idea validation system:
endpoints.getIdeas: Retrieve all your previously analyzed ideas
endpoints.analyzeIdea: Submit a new idea for analysis
endpoints.getIdeaById: Get detailed information about a specific idea
endpoints.getReports: Retrieve generated reports for your ideas

blog.title: Latest Insights & Trends
blog.subtitle: Explore our latest articles on entrepreneurship, idea validation, and market trends
blog.submitCasePromo: Have a success story? Submit your startup case study for our blog.

post1.title: 5 Key Metrics to Validate Your Business Idea
post1.excerpt: Learn which data points matter most when determining if your idea has market potential.
post1.content: When validating a business idea, there are several metrics that can help you determine whether your concept has potential to succeed in the market. These metrics include market size, customer acquisition cost, lifetime value of customers, profit margins, and growth potential. By analyzing these key indicators, entrepreneurs can make informed decisions before investing significant resources.

post2.title: How to Create an MVP That Actually Tests Your Hypothesis
post2.excerpt: Building the right minimum viable product can save you months of development time.
post2.content: A minimum viable product (MVP) should be designed with a clear hypothesis in mind. Rather than focusing on features, concentrate on what specific assumption you need to validate. Keep your MVP lean, measure the right metrics, and be prepared to pivot based on user feedback. This approach will save you time and resources while providing valuable insights into your idea's viability.

post3.title: Finding Your Niche: When Smaller Markets Mean Bigger Profits
post3.excerpt: Why targeting a narrower audience can lead to stronger market positioning and better returns.
post3.content: Counterintuitively, targeting a smaller, more specific market segment can often lead to greater success for startups. Niche markets typically have less competition, more specialized needs, and customers who are willing to pay premium prices for solutions tailored to their specific problems. This approach allows you to establish yourself as an expert and build a loyal customer base before considering expansion.

post4.title: The Entrepreneur's Guide to Angel Investment in Angola
post4.excerpt: How to attract early-stage investment for your startup in the growing Angolan market.
post4.content: Angola's startup ecosystem is evolving rapidly, with more angel investors looking for promising ventures. To attract this capital, entrepreneurs need to understand local investor expectations, regulatory environment, and networking opportunities. This guide explores the Angolan investment landscape and provides practical tips for securing early-stage funding in this emerging market.

post5.title: Technology Trends Reshaping African Startups in 2025
post5.excerpt: The innovations and technologies creating new opportunities for entrepreneurs across the continent.
post5.content: From mobile payment solutions to sustainable energy technologies, several key innovations are creating unprecedented opportunities for African entrepreneurs. This article examines how these technologies are solving uniquely African challenges while creating scalable business models that have potential for global expansion. We highlight success stories from various regions and sectors.

post6.title: From Idea to Market: The Journey of DMK's Startup Platform
post6.excerpt: An inside look at how Startupideia was developed and launched in Angola.
post6.content: In this exclusive case study, we share the development journey of Startupideia, from initial concept to market launch. Founder Marciairo Kumbuessa discusses the challenges faced as a solo developer building a tech startup in Angola, and how the platform evolved based on local entrepreneur needs and feedback from early users.

case1.description: An eco-friendly food delivery service that needed to validate their sustainable packaging model and pricing strategy.
case1.result: After using our platform, GreenDeliver pivoted their packaging strategy and secured $1.5M in seed funding within 3 months.

case2.description: A financial education platform targeting young adults with personalized learning paths and gamified experiences.
case2.result: Our analysis helped FinMentor refine their target demographic and feature set, resulting in 215% user growth in the first year.

case3.description: A healthcare startup focusing on preventive care through AI-powered monitoring and personalized recommendations.
case3.result: Using our validation tools, HealthTrack identified key partnerships opportunities and has now expanded to 5 countries.

aboutUs.title: Our Mission
aboutUs.subtitle: We're on a mission to help entrepreneurs validate their business ideas and increase their chances of success

mission.title: Why We Started
mission.description1: Startupideia was founded by Marciairo Kumbuessa, a solo developer with a vision to make business idea validation accessible to entrepreneurs in Angola and beyond. After experiencing firsthand the challenges of launching businesses without proper validation, he created Startupideia to solve this critical problem.
mission.description2: Today, DMK, Lda is helping entrepreneurs across Angola make data-driven decisions about their business ideas before investing significant resources.

company.title: DMK, Lda
company.description: Startupideia is owned and operated by DMK, Lda, an Angolan technology company based in Lubango, Huila Province. Founded with the mission of creating innovative solutions for local entrepreneurs, DMK is committed to fostering technological advancement in Angola.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our work and our relationships with customers

value1.title: Data-Driven Decisions
value1.description: We believe that successful businesses are built on evidence and insights, not just intuition and passion.

value2.title: Entrepreneurial Empowerment
value2.description: Our goal is to democratize access to business validation tools and knowledge for entrepreneurs across Angola and Africa.

value3.title: Continuous Innovation
value3.description: We're constantly improving our algorithms and methodologies to provide the most accurate validation possible.

member1.name: Marciairo Kumbuessa
member1.bio: Solo developer and entrepreneur with a passion for creating technology solutions that address local challenges.

member2.name: Dneisy Kumbuessa
member2.bio: Leads customer relationships and sales operations, ensuring our solutions meet the needs of local entrepreneurs.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: At Startupideia, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content1: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering for our services, expressing an interest in obtaining information about us or our products and services, or otherwise contacting us.
dataCollection.content2: The personal information that we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the choices you make. The personal information we collect may include the following:

useOfData.title: How We Use Your Information
useOfData.content1: We use personal information collected via our site for a variety of business purposes described below. We process your personal information for these purposes based on our legitimate business interests, in order to enter into or perform a contract with you, with your consent, and/or for compliance with our legal obligations. We use the information we collect or receive:

items.item1: To facilitate account creation and authentication
items.item2: To provide and maintain our services
items.item3: To process transactions and send related information
items.item4: To respond to inquiries and offer support
items.item5: To send administrative information and service updates

dataSecurity.title: Security of Your Information
dataSecurity.content1: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable.
dataSecurity.content2: We cannot guarantee the security of your information transmitted to our site; any transmission is at your own risk. We are not responsible for circumvention of any privacy settings or security measures contained on the site.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content1: We may use third-party service providers to help us operate our business and our site or administer activities on our behalf, such as sending out newsletters or surveys.
thirdPartyServices.content2: These third parties have access to your Personal Information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content1: We may use cookies, web beacons, tracking pixels, and other tracking technologies to help customize the Site and improve your experience. Most browsers are set to accept cookies by default. You can remove or reject cookies, but be aware that such action could affect the availability and functionality of the Site.
cookies.content2: By using the Site, you agree to be bound by our Cookie Policy.

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:

items.item1: Right to know what information we collect, use, share, or sell
items.item2: Right to delete your personal information
items.item3: Right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information
items.item4: Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or comments about this privacy policy, you may email us at privacy@startupideia.com or by mail to 123 Innovation Ave, San Francisco, CA 94103, USA.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.introduction: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Startupideia's website and services. By accessing this website and using our services, we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use Startupideia's website and services if you do not accept all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account on our site and using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our site or services.

accountRegistration.title: Account Registration and Requirements
accountRegistration.content1: To use certain features of the site, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
accountRegistration.content2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, and you accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

services.title: Service Description
services.content1: Startupideia provides a platform for validating business ideas through data analysis and market insights. Our services include idea analysis, market assessment, business model evaluation, and strategic planning recommendations.
services.content2: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the services at any time, with or without notice to you.

payment.title: Payment and Subscription Terms
payment.content1: Some of our services are offered on a subscription basis. By subscribing to our services, you agree to pay the applicable fees. Subscription fees are billed in advance on either a monthly or annual basis, depending on the subscription plan you select.
payment.content2: You may cancel your subscription at any time, but refunds are provided only in accordance with our Refund Policy.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content1: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Startupideia and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries.
intellectualProperty.content2: Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Startupideia.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content1: You retain ownership of any content that you submit, post or display on or through the Service, including your business ideas and related information ('User Content').
userContent.content2: By providing User Content to the Service, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute your User Content solely for the purpose of providing our services to you.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:

items.item1: Use the Service in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations
items.item2: Attempt to interfere with, compromise the system integrity or security, or decipher any transmissions to or from the servers running the Service
items.item3: Use the Service to send unsolicited communications, promotions, or advertisements, or to spam
items.item4: Upload or transmit viruses, malware, or other malicious code
items.item5: Use the Service to harvest, collect, gather, or assemble information about others
items.item6: Impersonate another person or misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis. Startupideia makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims all such warranties, including without limitation implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, and warranties arising from course of dealing or usage of trade.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: In no event shall Startupideia be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of the Service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@startupideia.com.
